title: Backend-Development for ALDI SOUTH Digital
description: For the German division responsible for the Mein ALDI e-food project, I carried out the backend development for various in-house solutions.
tasks: Requirement analysis, technical specification and implementation of the backend for an assortment management tool
Implementation of an automation solution for inventory monitoring and availability control

title: Technical lead in an e-food project for ALDI SOUTH International
description: I was responsible for the technical direction of the backend development in a German sister project of the international e-food/e-commerce initiative of ALDI SOUTH. The project has since gone live under the name Mein ALDI.
tasks: Specification of solution architectures for an international multi-store Spryker poject
Coordination of back-end development across multiple domain-oriented vertical feature teams
Requirement analysis and design of algorithms for topics such as availability forecasting, optimisation of picking and delivery, and related topics
DevOps Engineering - Configuration of Spryker environments and creation of installation scripts
Alignment of technical releases in the context of a centralised release process for multiple countries

Planning and realisation of the integration of various systems and interfaces (legacy systems, country-specific and international server and cloud environments, platforms from third-party manufacturers, e.g. for delivery fleets or automated pick-up stations)
Rapid Prototyping/Development of Proofs of Concept

title: Full Stack Responsibility for innovation projects of ALDI SOUTH Germany
description: As a member of the small but powerful Digital Business Development & Strategy team, I have taken on professionally and technologically broad responsibilities for cloud infrastructure, architecture and development of in-house-developed software prototypes, data analysis, and the design and optimization of technical and business processes. As the content details of the projects carried out are highly competitive, I am not allowed to disclose them.
tasks: Design and implementation of a cross-project serverless architecture based on AWS
Planning and evaluation of data-driven hypothesis tests
Performing deep data analytics
Development and operation of various apps, APIs and machine learning use cases
Planning and developing integrations of our partner companies' systems as well as legacy systems of the Group
DevOps - main responsibility for CI/CD and cloud infrastructure
Content co-creation of digital innovations of different areas of food retail and logistics

title: Development of an online insurance application
description: Together with another developer, I implemented a complete online contract for a new product of a german insurance company within three weeks.
tasks: Development of a frontend based on Angular Dynamic Forms
Development of product-specific Java services for the group-wide OpenShift cluster
Setting up the CI/CD pipelines for the project

title: openVALIDATION
description: I am one of the core developers of the open source project openVALIDATION (openvalidation.io) created at BROCKHAUS AG. It is a software for translating validation rules from natural language into executable Java, C#, JavaScript, or Python source code. BiPRO, a standardization association of the German insurance industry, is expected to include openVALIDATION in the upcoming interface standard "RNext".
tasks: Strategic and technological participation the project
Development of the Python code generator
Development of features and integration tests
Setting up CI/CD pipelines, automation of Maven releases and GitHub administration

title: PoC for AI-based document processing in medical underwriting
description: I developed a prototype AI system for automated document processing at a reinsurance company, consisting of various Python services and a REST API. The range of functions includes image-based document classification and semantic parsing of natural language text for information extraction into a structured target data model.
tasks: Architectural design of convolutional neural networks based on current scientific knowledge
Implementation of a semantic parsing pipeline that combines deep learning and computational linguistic approaches
Development of a feedback learning process for the self-optimization of machine learning models

title: Data & Analytics in an in-house digital startup
description: As part of a digitization project of a German transport company, I developed modern mobile app and API solutions in the areas of mobility and entertainment as a member of a highly agile development team in lean startup format.
tasks: Conceptualization and development of AI-based, personalized and contextualized content curation
Statistical data analysis for data-driven MVP tests of an iOS app
Support in planning, development and administration of the data analytics infrastructure
Member of the architecture board for a new API platform of the group based on GraphQL
General support in the backend and DevOps area

title: UI test automation and IT offshoring for an insurance company
description: In an operating team for the web-based sales system of German insurance company, I supported an offshoring project with the Indian partner company.
tasks: Design of a test and test automation strategy
Knowledge transfer to Indian offshore employees
Prototyping test automation tools
